sentence: Rebekah Jones, the fired Florida health official who became a media darling in 2020 after she accused the Ron DeSantis administration of pressuring her to fudge the state's COVID data, saw her claims quietly fall apart last week.
author: Brian Flood
title: Media darling Rebekah Jones' claims of Florida COVID data manipulation 'did not occur,' IG says
